name: Space Jump (x3lives)
description:
Hello there i been working on game development for a while now and after a long

learning journey i managed to make my first game "Space Jump" as of right now

It is just a prototype with only 2 level's in total fully functional Menu.

I want to thank ansimuz for the game assets and Farai for his music production.

And last but not least to YOU! if you decided to try my game!
